body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Robert Garcia and the customer's name is Julie Phillips.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Robert Garcia, and I am with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Robert, I'm Julie Phillips. I'm looking for some information about your motorcycle options.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hi Julie! It's great to meet you. We have a wide range of motorcycles available. May I ask how long you have been riding?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I've been riding for about two years now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's awesome! What type of motorcycle are you currently riding?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a small cruiser right now, but I'm looking to upgrade.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great choice! Upgrading can really enhance your riding experience. Could I also get your zip code to check what models we have available in your area?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! One two three four five. Also, could you please provide me with your email address to send you more information?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Julie! I really appreciate your time today. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
